name: Kirtle
description:
Tunic-inspired ttrpg combining aspects of Into the Odd, Cairn, & Liminal Horror. The goal was to make the rules for a ttrpg mimic a video game manual design.

If folks are interested, I might refine the layout and add some more content (illustrations, one-page dungeon maps, more secret codes).

---

If you haven't played Tunic, you should definitely go do that: https://tunicgame.com/
